name: Chargebee
description: Integrate with Chargebee to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Subscriptions
tools.description: List Chargebee subscriptions. Optionally filter by status, customer, or plan. Returns subscription IDs, plans, and statuses.

tools.name: Create Subscription
tools.description: Create a new subscription in Chargebee. Specify a plan and customer details.

tools.name: List Customers
tools.description: List customers in Chargebee. Optionally filter by email or name. Returns customer names, emails, and IDs.

tools.name: List Invoices
tools.description: List invoices in Chargebee. Optionally filter by status or customer. Returns invoice IDs, amounts, and statuses.

tools.name: Cancel Subscription
tools.description: Cancel a Chargebee subscription. Choose to cancel immediately or at the end of the current term.

site.label: Chargebee Site
site.description: Your Chargebee site name (e.g. "mycompany" for mycompany.chargebee.com)
